summary: After her father dies and she moves to a new town, Mackie wants to join a certain gang/band. But they've got this boys-only rule. So Mackie comes up with an audacious plan...only it begins ... See full summary Â»
cast: Gwynyth Walsh|Eric Christmas|Gema Zamprogna|Steven Andrade|Martin Smits|Matthew Beckett|Sarah Sawatsky|Karen Barker|Kirsty Elgert|Wayne Nicklas|Tom Anniko|Michael Gottli|Susanna Portnoy|John Bluethner|Jan Skene|Samantha Chemerika|Chioma Patterson|Victor Cowie|Barry Kennedy|Bonnie Hay|Patricia Hunter|Joelle Prober|Rachel Moody
title: The Challengers
